website_summaries.verdict: Unless you don't have a GameCube controller or any GameCube games, give this Wii peripheral a pass.
pros: enables play of downloadable Virtual Console titles
cons: needs to be tethered to the Wiimote, from which it also draws power and connectivity
offers few advantages over connecting an old GameCube controller

customer_reviews.title: NOT A KNOCKOFF!
customer_reviews.text: this is not a knock off version of this controller because i've seen like a million of them on amazon, works very very well with the snes classic!.
customer_reviews.author: NICK

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought an NES classic and was struggling to find a second remote for us to use. This one works great for the NES classic (mini).
customer_reviews.author: Nika Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Confirmed to work on both NES classic and SNES classic
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on both an NES classic Mini and an SNES classic Mini. Works wonderfully. The home button works! That is what I bought this for so very happy. Buttons respond as they should. Recommend using the controller extension cord for this only downside, as it's very short. But I already bought 2 for use with the other controllers anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: " and/or Super Nintendo Entertainment System
customer_reviews.text: If you play classic (i.e., Nintendo Entertainment System, or "NES," and/or Super Nintendo Entertainment System, or "SNES") games through the Wii Virtual Console, you NEED this controller! Works nearly as well as the original, SNES controller, though the L and R buttons at the upper left and upper right require you to press down further.
customer_reviews.author: Joy77Division

customer_reviews.title: A Must!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my Nintendo and SNES Mini for the simple fact that it has a home button to bring you back to the main menu. Fits comfortably in hands. Much better than the controllers included
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Morales Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Just a few small annoyances...
customer_reviews.text: This controller was great for playing my Wii virtual console games, since I don't have a regular GameCube controller. There were a couple things I didn't like about it though. The first is that the cable comes out of the bottom of the controller. This is uncomfortable and weird. The second is that the controller is so light. I like my controllers to have a bit of weight to them, but other people might like it light. Something that boggled me for some time were the mysterious slots in the back of the controller. I did some research and I believe the only thing that makes use of the slots is the.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Gates

customer_reviews.title: Why is the cord at the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Controller works great but design with the cord at the bottom is weird. Doesn’t get in the way of gaming, just very different experience with that seemingly Backwards design
customer_reviews.author: James Pizzola

customer_reviews.title: wii controller
customer_reviews.text: This review is more about the seller than the product which is as expected. I give them a minus one in this respect. Apparently items comes from another country but doesn't say that or I would have purchased it elsewhere. Kids are not very patient as you are well aware. The seller did return my emails promptly but it took over a month to receive item...thus the rating. If your child needs one of these go elsewhere or you'll be hearing "is it here yet" on a daily basis from your kids.
customer_reviews.author: horsesrawesome

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could play Virtual Console games (and emulated games) on the Nintendo Wii. The controller works as advertised and I have no complaints! This controller plugs into the bottom of a WiiMote, so, while there is a cord (non-wireless), you can take the WiiMote+Controller tether anywhere within range of the Wii's bluetooth. I've enjoyed playing old SNES games (which I think the controller is designed the most for). N64, NES, and Genesis games are also ported well with this controller, and I was able to adjust for these button setups quickly. I recommend this controller for anyone with a Nintendo Wii that enjoys playing older games (NES, SNES, SEGA Gensis/Master System, MAME, Neo-Geo, N64, etc).
customer_reviews.author: K. Clain

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until my son left it out and the dog ate it. Would've purchased my next one from them but they were sold out so I had to go to another Amazon seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ottomatic

customer_reviews.title: Good for soft-modded wiis.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with SNES and SEGA genesis emulators I installed on my Wii. This was definitely a good buy for that purpose. However it plugs into the Wii controller instead of the GameCube controller jack, so it ends up draining a lot of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Costakis

customer_reviews.title: Going Old School
customer_reviews.text: After getting this, I immediately bought Contra III and I had a blast feeling like I was 8 all over again. The controller feels really nice, and the buttons are great. My only issue is that it's wired to the Wiimote which just kind of dangles on sits in your lap and does nothing. I was hoping they'd have made this wireless on its own, but I suppose they had their reasons. This is particularly good for me since I don't own Gamecube controllers and if I did I wouldn't want to connect them in fear of ripping my Wii off my entertainment center. Good buy - get it.
customer_reviews.author: Mainframe

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great. Now I can really enjoy my vintage video games like back in the day. (Minus blowing in the cartridges or having someone step too close to the machine, making the game pop up) I bought several of these to enjoy with friends and I have definitely gotten my money worth out of them. I do wish it was wireless though. It is kind of obnoxious having to tether it to the Wii-mote
customer_reviews.author: Eddie's Affordable Gear

customer_reviews.title: Great product, a bit strange feeling and the wire is a bit much.
customer_reviews.text: The wire is in the worst possible spot for a wire on a controller, but it does what it's supposed to even if the feel isn't as refined as an Xbox 360 controller.
customer_reviews.author: Osiris

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Wii controller ever.
customer_reviews.text: This controller would almost be my favorite controller of all time, my only issue is the odd placement of the 2nd trigger buttons. Nonetheless it works perfectly for virtual console games like SNES, NES, N64, GBA even, some Wii games are better played with this guy as well. If I could I would use it as a PC controller, it is that awesome. Highly recommend for anyone looking to play older games on their Wii or WiiU.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: great for classic games
customer_reviews.text: This is a great controller if you want to play classic games on your wii. It plugs into your wii mote--which works then essentially as a wireless remote in that it isn't tethered to the wii console. It will use your wii controller batteries so I guess that is a negative if you do not have a charger for your batteries. Makes playing pac man fun! (which was my first reason for getting it). And i discovered a lot of classic games that are fairly inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Personal fave
customer_reviews.text: This is my personal favorite controller. Too bad it does not have a built in battery like the Pro Controllers. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Collector Togami

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a friend to use, and he likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend to use, and he likes it! Says it's real useful!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Lara

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, was a little dirty but I cleaned it with some alcohol wipes and it works well. Price was good and was delivered quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: A classic controller is preferred for some games, particularly classic games. This controller is pretty well made and durable, but after about a year of use, the buttons did not always work. This controller was not used excessively, it was not used for hours on end - maybe a few hours throughout the week at most. Perhaps mine was a fluke? It is comfortable to use and if you had an original Nintendo, it will be more familiar to use.
customer_reviews.author: MyPenNameTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing controllers for playing classic games on the wii and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing controllers for playing classic games on the wii and wii u. Great build, great performance. Get em now before they disappear and cost a fortune. Because they will.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 Controller
customer_reviews.text: Plugged this controller into my Ceiling fan and I can now play Super Mario on my laptop without lag!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Schmoe

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but overpriced and I concur with ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, but overpriced and I concur with others that complain about the analog joysticks being too close together. My hand also started to hurt when playing games that require you to hold down buttons for long periods of time (e.g. Mario Kart)
customer_reviews.author: mossman

customer_reviews.title: Limited, but extensive use
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for use with one game, and I use it a lot. I have loved Mario Cart since it's inception for Super Nintendo. When I got a Wii for a gift, I have played a variety of games adn I'm not a gamer. The interaction is great, but with Mario Carts it''s just plan fun. I now have the Nintendo 64 version which I use this controller and of course Wii Mario Cart. I'll let you know when it become disfunctional, which might be soon considering how much use it gets!
customer_reviews.author: JJR

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought a snes->wii adapter, but didn't remember the snes controller being so lame. After I got sick of that, I bought the classic controller in hopes of making VC games play a little better. It did, and infact I absolutely love it, I've a few minor complains like the 2 thumb sticks when pushed toward the center practically hit, and the cord coming out the bottom, though cool on the dreamcast, not so cool on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Donat

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: True to the Wii. Worked right out the box, and makes playing the many classic games a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: JamroK

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these controllers, I couldn't find them anywhere else in the US so they came from the UK. No problem with my wii at all. I'm very pleased that I was able to get them at a great price. I would recommend this seller for anything electronic very very happy
customer_reviews.author: gramatt

customer_reviews.title: My Wii U is now complete again
customer_reviews.text: Product came as advertized, in a short delivery time. Customer Service is great as well. I had to adjust the order, and the response time was within an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for classic gamers!
customer_reviews.text: Love this controller. Feels right with classic games. I was just a kid when super nintendo came out, so I have downloaded several SNES games onto my wii. This controller is awesome for playing those games. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the cord comes out of the bottom of the controller instead of the top, which is strange to me because if your arms are in a relaxed position, the cord is pressing into your lap or stomach which could lead to one of those problems in the future where the cord has to be bent to that exact position or it won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: controller was in acceptable condition it was a little messed up by the plug like if something very small was biting on it but .
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast, controller was in acceptable condition it was a little messed up by the plug like if something very small was biting on it but other than that it works
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to play the original Nintendo games glad I did makes them much better.
customer_reviews.author: SolidSShady

customer_reviews.title: Great controller!
customer_reviews.text: This controller is great! I don't know about the battery consumption because mi Wii wireless controllers have rechargeable battery packs with specific docks where they rest in and stay charged all day... I've never been so comfortable playing old games in my Wii like with these controllers!
customer_reviews.author: Phreak777

customer_reviews.title: Great controller!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and we are so glad that we purchased this so we could play the Nintendo games that require the classic controller. It plugs into our wii remotes and works flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for Virtual Console
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to play a lot of Virtual Console stuff, specifically old SNES and NES stuff, you've got to get this -- it's so much more comfortable than playing with the Wiimote. One note of caution, though -- it takes some getting used to on SMB, because they programmed the buttons oddly, so that the two buttons you'd intuitively put your fingers on aren't the two you're supposed to use. I find that I have to play that game with my right hand twisted a bit sideways to find the right buttons. Other games, such as SMW, seem to have it right, though.
customer_reviews.author: MH2001

customer_reviews.title: Could've been better
customer_reviews.text: The package was bent badly & cut up some. Looks used & not brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these. One of them works and the other works some of the time.
customer_reviews.author: joelle

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Def. a product you should find used...although its usefulness is highly encouraged when playing more RPG, etc....games..you'll want to have this..but NEW is NOT necessary The product was accurate and delivery date was as well....i give this user and its dependability 4.8/5 I would purchase from this user again as well as recommend them to others, due to FAIRNESS in PRICING and INTEGRITY
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F Brown

customer_reviews.title: SUPER MARIO BROS!! and DONKEY KONG
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for nostalgia - works well with old school games on the wii.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised - now where's MAME?
customer_reviews.text: You pretty much have no choice but to buy this if you want to play Virtual Console games. Here's hoping the hacking community figures out the Wii and gets a native Wii MAME emulator running soon. Wouldn't it be great to have the original Tempest, Frogger, Pac-Man and other classic games running on Wii? Nintendo, if you're listening, I'll pay 50,000 Wii points for a well-done MAME port if it will support user-provided ROMs on an SD card and savable per-game assignment of controller buttons!
customer_reviews.author: Buzz Lightyear

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Nintendo Controllers
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, both in great condition. Very responsive and function perfectly. Both authentic Nintendo controllers. Works great with my Wii Homebrew.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Petronio

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the Gamecube controller for those classic titles
customer_reviews.text: If you have the classic games from the original nintendo you need this controller. I can't stand using the gamecube controller. This is great because it plugs into the nunchuck slot on your wiimote and you can sit across the room and play your games like they were meant to be played.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked for more games
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to get used to Mariokart using the wheel at first. This controller definitely helped. I love that it plugs into the Wii remote so you don't have to be close to the unit. It would be even better if they made it wireless all together. I also wish it works with more games.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Great controller
customer_reviews.text: This controller is simply amazing and makes playing the classic games more fun. You can even use this for games like Mortal Kombat where a traditional controller is better suited.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace the controller I had. It was just exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using it for the NES acclaimed and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: DABemis

customer_reviews.title: Got it for Super Mario World
customer_reviews.text: I bought Super Mario World and some other games to play on my Nintendo Wii. The Gamecube controller doesn't work well at all with it, so I bought this. It worked perfect and I had no problems with it all.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah A. Fort

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The remotes work so well! Have not had one single problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: RaiderBatman

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to the Wii gaming system. Im in my mid 20s so Im still attatched to the older games from NES and N64 which you need this controller to play. So happy I got this. ThankYou!!
customer_reviews.author: Isch Michel

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It came exactly as described! Great packaging and great condition as well! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: Always appreciate the honesty. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: It is indeed in great condition. Very satisfied. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: needed an extra remote for the nintendo mini and this works well.
customer_reviews.author: MommaOf6

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Controller was pretty much brand new and very clean. No issues. Buttons all worked properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jd 2

customer_reviews.title: Not a game >.> lol
customer_reviews.text: Works well couldn't play Zelda ocarina of time without it so necessary buttons worked no sticking both joysticks very responsive for a used product very happy
customer_reviews.author: Lutient

customer_reviews.title: Classic Look n Feel
customer_reviews.text: It's Classic snes-like design makes it real comfortable to hold (a tad on the 'small' size compared to current standards). The promise of using it for any of the classic VC games and some of the new games coming along the wii makes it a worth-while accessory to have.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Llibre

customer_reviews.title: great controller!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wireless controller. You just hook it up to your Wiimote and it's ready to go! How much simpler can it get? Works very well too. Had it for a year now I think and it's still working great!
customer_reviews.author: MoonbeamMama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly and after two years is still alive :)
customer_reviews.author: Dawnpv

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly. I bought 4 of these I believe and at the time they were only about $5, I'm not sure where you can find them for this price anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany719

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The controller hooks into your wiimote, not the wii. This allows you to play wirelessly, which is pretty nice. This is essentially a gamecube controller that uses the model of an SNES controller. The buttons are smooth - much smoother than the gamecube controller that I was using. I also like having the old abxy button setup rather than the gamecube controller's odd configuration. For playing classic downloaded games on the wii, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Get the Nyko instead.
customer_reviews.text: It works, but it is not very comfortable. You still have to plug it to the Wii controller, so you'll have that hanging and/or around you. Get the Nyko Wii Wing Wireless Controller instead, it is $10 more, but worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Freakonforfatty

customer_reviews.title: basic functions, and arrived intact
customer_reviews.text: is difficult to know which game this control works, try to play with some emusladosres there and nothing works, but maybe I serve with others not yet proved at least it works when connected.
customer_reviews.author: RGLM

customer_reviews.title: Turns out to be a great controller!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little unsure about the Wii Classic Controller before giving it a try. However, it turns out to be an excellent option for playing classic games on the Wii. Some might find that a Gamecube controller will give them better results in newer 3D titles like Super Mario 64. But for older games the Classic really is the way to go. My only real gripe is that the cord comes out of the bottom instead of the top.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome controller.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is essential for retro gamers on the Wii. Works great with all of the emulators and Virtual Console games. The D-Pad feels great too.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Backlin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Am I missing something? Controller plug doesn’t fit in my wii...
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A good peripheral controller for the Classic Games
customer_reviews.text: Controller is very comfortable to hold; puts off a real 'Super Nintendo' era vibe when using; very durable; plugs into wireless Wii-mote, thus keeping the wireless setup; Perfect response in interaction...a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: aptwalker

customer_reviews.title: It was what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It was what I wanted and got here when they said.
customer_reviews.author: everitt kiele

customer_reviews.title: White controller? Expect yellowing.
customer_reviews.text: Minor discoloration due to age, but other than that the controller is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Great way to play Wii games with a classic control
customer_reviews.text: Great way to play Wii games with a classic control. Very similar to the Super Nintendo controller. I prefer it over the nunchuck any day.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Advantages of Classic Controller
customer_reviews.text: One nice feature that has been mostly overlooked with the classic controller is that it can replace the nunchuck on most games. If you are buying a second remote and have the classic controller, a second nunchuck may not be nessessary.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: If you like that Old-Skoo SNES feel with Analogs Added In.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable controller for playing your old-skoo games through the Wii's Virtual Console with that SNES feel. The Analogs are Accurate. No Complaints.
customer_reviews.author: J Dubs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Addition
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent addition to our Wii accessories. Works great and is easy to hook up and use. Love it for the classic games.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Eisele

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! There is only one design flaw - why does the cord come out of the bottom towards the player?? That's a little weird.
customer_reviews.author: LucasP

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for my Wii. I love playing some of those older games that you can only download so this was a great idea to get so that I can play retro.
customer_reviews.author: Darkly Knighted

customer_reviews.title: The controller is easy to use and has a nice feel but sadly ...
customer_reviews.text: The controller is easy to use and has a nice feel but sadly does not work consistently across all Wii games.
customer_reviews.author: Mo B

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected, fun to have for the older games
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenage son so we could download some of the older games that we used to play on the N64. Well worth the investment, now we can play Legend of Zelda and other games on our wii.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Extrema for the Wii
customer_reviews.text: This is a good replacement controller or in addition to your query works great you're happy with it Even works for the Wii u
customer_reviews.author: john smith

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it !!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product !! My son was very happy with it !! Works great ! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: BACK TO THE ROOTS
customer_reviews.text: SO FOR THOSE OF YOU WHO GREW UP PLAYING NINTENDO OR SUPER NINTENDO THIS CONTROLLER IS VERY NASTALGIC (SORRY IF I MIS-SPELLED IT) ANYWAYS IT IS A VERY GOOD BUY FOR THOSE OF YOU WHO WANT TO RE LIVE THEIR CHILD HOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Dann Rosenstein

customer_reviews.title: Great for classic Nintendo Games
customer_reviews.text: This is a great controller for playing the classic nintendo games on your Wii. No problems using it to play all the mario bros games etc. No problems, bought this almost 4 yrs ago.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R

customer_reviews.title: not wireless
customer_reviews.text: This would be so much better if it were wireless. It actually plugs into a remote and not the actual game console, which is good and bad. It is a little annoying having it attached to a remote and to have to hold the remote in your lap because the cord is so short, but that is better than having a big ol' long cord stretching across the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: almost like the SNES controller
customer_reviews.text: Just slightly bigger, and the D-pad is located a bit higher than on the SNES controller, but other than that, amazing. And of course it is necessary for Street Fighter.
customer_reviews.author: johndoe13

customer_reviews.title: My kid says it is a great buy
customer_reviews.text: My kid says it's a great buy. The quality is great and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Readersrus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works just as it should for the older games on my Wii
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Essential for Playing Classic Games on Your Wii
customer_reviews.text: Great, well made controller. Much easier to play classic games that you download to your Wii (like SMB 3) with this than with the Wii Remote and/or nun chuck.
customer_reviews.author: MaH

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! Good buy for the price. Was very helpful for the wii games you can download. actually ended up buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Wii Classic Controller
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for someone else, but I have two myself and they are great for playing those classic game downloads on the Wii, like Golden Axe and Zelda.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Broenner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Condition
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nearly new Wii Classic controller and this one was exactly what I was looking for- for the lowest price possible!
customer_reviews.author: MochaJoey

customer_reviews.title: Solid Controller, Nice to go "wireless" with Wiimote
customer_reviews.text: The Good: It's a nice controller. Nintendo's genuine products always seem to be superior, especially the analog control sticks -- very accurate. The Bad: Doesn't seem to work in Gamecube mode.
customer_reviews.author: R. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The controller stopped working after 2 hours. Defective product sent. I expected more out of buying a Nintendo Wii Classic controller, rather than an off brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love the classic
customer_reviews.text: Love the classic controller, but unfortunately not all games work with it, so be aware of that before you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: GBarrTech

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: This controller helped me beat Bison in Street Fighter 2 on the first night I bought SF2 off the Virtual Console. Ahhh... the memories.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Just buy one.
customer_reviews.text: I am nuts when it comes to video games. The classic wii controller is a must for anyone who is downloading old SNES or N64 games, unless you have a game cube controller then you do not need this. I would advise that you only buy one controller. I bought two have a family of 4. I am the only one who plays the old stuff, my daughter does too occasionally, but never to the point that I felt the need to open the 2nd controller. Buy one see if its enough for your house. If not you can buy a 2nd later on.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cattane

customer_reviews.title: Wii Classic Controller
customer_reviews.text: Hello, purchased this so that we could play Donkey Kong on the Wii - love it. Great product, easy to use. Just like the old school controller.
customer_reviews.author: FireSign84

customer_reviews.title: Just like the old days!
customer_reviews.text: It took a little getting used to the cord coming out of the bottom, but after you get used to it, it brings back memories! Very easy to use and control your game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great controller for classic Nintendo and SNES games.
customer_reviews.text: These controllers are great. I use them to play the classic Nintendo and Super Nintendo games with my nieces. It's great to see them loving the games I played growing up and these controllers make it possible.
customer_reviews.author: Irena Cembauer

customer_reviews.title: Woks just fine
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty good controller, only it is not cordless. But overall works just fine. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: classic nintendo controller
customer_reviews.text: This controller allows us to play some of the older classic games on a new Wii System. Less clutter of numerous game systems and games and still lots of fun. The controller was in great condition and as described in the listing. The shipping was faster than expected. The experience was very satifactory.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, came as described, no complaints. But this controller
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Giammarino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect controller to play classic games on wii.
customer_reviews.text: This controller will help you get the most out of your virtual console games on the wii. It will also help with some of the harder to control wii games, especially the "operation rainfall" rpg's. A very responsive controller.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it myself. I have three children who wear it out. It works like it should and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: 84Beretta

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: i'm very satisfied with what i got. works great. just what i expected. i would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria K.

product_meta.title: Wii Classic Controller
product_meta.description: "Wii Classic Controller. Over the years, Nintendo has innovated with controllers and control schemes that have become industry standards. The Classic Controller blends elements from Nintendo's NES, Super NES, and N64 controllers to allow for seamless play control over the titles that span the Virtual Console library."
feature_bullets: Use the control pad along with the A and B buttons for a familiar experience when playing Nintendo Entertainment System games
Dual analog sticks help the authentic feel when playing Nintendo 64 games
Stylish controller is comfortable to hold, even during extended gaming sessions
The controls you're familiar with in your favorite classic games, all on one controller
